subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: In his first home game with the Dallas Mavericks in more than 11 years, Jason Kidd had 11 points, 9 rebounds and 8 assists Monday night in a 102-94 victory against the Chicago Bulls.
snippet: In his first home game with the Dallas Mavericks in more than 11 years, Jason Kidd had 11 points, 9 rebounds and 8 assists Monday night in a 102-94 victory against the Chicago Bulls.
